      • checkShapeEqual

        public static void checkShapeEqual(Matrix A,
                                   Matrix B)
        Checks if two matrices are of the same shape.
        Parameters:
        A - of shape m x n
        B - of shape o x p
        Throws:
        IncompatibleShapeException - if not (m == o && n == p)

      • checkShapeEqual

        public static void checkShapeEqual(Matrix A,
                                   Matrix B,
                                   Matrix C)
        Checks if three matrices are of the same shape.
        Parameters:
        A - of shape m x n
        B - of shape o x p
        C - of shape q x e
        Throws:
        IncompatibleShapeException - if not (m == o == q && n == p == e)

      • shapeMul2

        public static boolean shapeMul2(Matrix A,
                                Matrix B)
        Checks if two matrices can be multiplied.
        Parameters:
        A - of shape m x n
        B - of shape o x p
        Returns:
        true iff n == o

      • checkShapeMatrixMatrixMult

        public static void checkShapeMatrixMatrixMult(Matrix A,
                                              Matrix B,
                                              Matrix C)
        Checks if A, B and C have valid shapes to multiply A and B and store the result in C.
        Parameters:
        A - of shape m x n
        B - of shape o x p
        C - of shape q x r
        Throws:
        IncompatibleShapeException - if not (n == o && m == r)

      • checkShapeSquare

        public static void checkShapeSquare(Matrix A)
        Checks if A is square
        Parameters:
        A - of shape m x n
        Throws:
        IncompatibleShapeException - if not (m == n)

      • checkShapeTranspose

        public static void checkShapeTranspose(Matrix A,
                                       Matrix B)
        Checks if B can store A transposed.
        Parameters:
        A - of shape m x n
        A - of shape o x p
        Throws:
        IncompatibleShapeException - if not (m == p && n == o)

      • checkApplyVectorToRows

        public static void checkApplyVectorToRows(Matrix A,
                                          Matrix V,
                                          Matrix B)
        Checks if v can be applied to the rows of A, and if the result can be stored in B.
        Parameters:
        A - of shape m x n
        V - of shape 1 x o
        B - of shape p x q
        Throws:
        IncompatibleShapeException - if not (n == o && m == p && n == q)

      • checkApplyVectorToCols

        public static void checkApplyVectorToCols(Matrix A,
                                          Matrix V,
                                          Matrix B)
        Checks if v can be applied to the cols of A, and if the result can be stored in B.
        Parameters:
        A - of shape m x n
        V - of shape o x 1
        B - of shape p x q
        Throws:
        IncompatibleShapeException - if not (m == o && m == p && n == q)
